instruction: You're a rapper. You're writing a lyric for me, and the first line of the song is, 'Can't keep up.'
Expand on the sci-fi story 'The last man in the world suddenly hears a knock at the door,' beginning with this line

content: Let's say you're a veteran Shakeology creator and you need to make a very touching short video about fatherhood that's under three minutes long and has a very tight plot
